output_list.description: mintToken function allows arbitrary increase of token supply, aka 'The minting function' issue.
sell function allows a potential trap due to overflow of 'amount * sellPrice' in 'msg.sender.transfer(amount * sellPrice)', aka 'The sell function integer overflow issue'.
buy function allows a potential trap due to overflow of 'msg.value / buyPrice' in '_transfer(this, msg.sender, amount)', aka 'The buy function integer overflow issue'.
mintToken function allows a potential trap due to overflow of 'mintedAmount' in 'balanceOf[target] = balanceOf[target].add(mintedAmount)', aka 'The mintToken function integer overflow issue'.
burnFrom function allows a potential trap due to overflow of 'balanceOf[_from] -= _value' in 'balanceOf[_from] = balanceOf[_from].sub(_value)', aka 'The burnFrom function integer overflow issue'.
